stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

SPLASH_SCREEN

SPLASH_SCREEN : SPLASH_SCREEN

SPLASH_SCREEN : enter / #123; lcd->SPLASH_SCREEN()#59; #125;

SPLASH_SCREEN : enter / #123; timeout_ms = 3*1000#59; #125;

HOME

HOME : HOME

HOME : enter / #123; lcd->HOME()#59; #125;

state MENU {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as MENU.(InitialState)

        DISARM_SYSTEM

        DISARM_SYSTEM : DISARM_SYSTEM

        DISARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->DISARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        DISARM_SYSTEM : ENTER_PRESS / #123; ctrl->disarm()#59; #125;

        ARM_SYSTEM

        ARM_SYSTEM : ARM_SYSTEM

        ARM_SYSTEM : enter / #123; lcd->ARM_SYSTEM()#59; #125;

        ARM_SYSTEM : ENTER_PRESS / #123; ctrl->arm()#59; #125;

}

ROOT.(InitialState) --> SPLASH_SCREEN

SPLASH_SCREEN --> HOME : TIMEOUT

HOME --> MENU : ENTER_PRESS

MENU --> HOME : (BACK_PRESS, TIMEOUT)

MENU.(InitialState) --> DISARM_SYSTEM

DISARM_SYSTEM --> ARM_SYSTEM : DOWN_PRESS

ARM_SYSTEM --> DISARM_SYSTEM : UP_PRESS
Events
settings
